item.description:
Aspiring artists, create a winter scene with the help of Impressionist artist Connie Festo Lafond & a glass of wine! No artistic experience necessary.


We will have fun getting in touch with our creative side in this 2 hour class. You will leave with your own original matted masterpiece!

"Fun, relaxing, and easy-to-follow guidance from Connie. Nice group of painters as well. Would definitely do again, and I highly recommend." _Eileen from the last class


$39 for everything (wine included) or 2 for $70 (cash or check)
item.name: Watercolor & Wine - Winter Trees
